text: @RahulGandhi Hit and run politics.. one day PM chit hai, next economics, next demon n gst, next covid19, next china, next why soldiers went without weapons ... neither knows details nor has any solutions. Just make a statement n change the subject after getting caught!! Hilarious stuff
